dct_title_s: International travel maps Brasil : scale 1:2,200,000 / 1:4,500,000 : Rio de Janeiro / edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Levin Krämer, Phuong Vu, Tran Dinh Cuong ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Northern Brazil includes ancillary map: Fernando de Noronha (scale 1:100,000). Southern Brazil map includes ancillary map: Rio de Janeiro (scale 1:12,900), color illustration, and location map. Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Title from panel. Includes index. Includes tourist notes. Ancillary maps: Fernando de Noronha. Scale 1:100,000 -- Rio de Janeiro. Scale 1:12,900. Tourist maps showing international and provincial boundaries, 7 classes of roads, railway, tourist sites, mines, oil fields, and places of worship. Includes index, and historical and tourist information. "Waterproof". "He representation of boundaries is not necessarily authoritative".
